subject: 6+R shifter issues
description_text:
Hi there

I recently bought a SIMSONN 6+r shifter see below
[image: image.png]
Shifter was working great, I didn't use shifter for a few weeks. No when i
plug in the device Windows does not recognise the device, nothing in device
manager or joy.CPL

The two lights on top light up and have power. but device does not function

Do you have any ideas what could be wrong?

I'm good with electronics so I can solder new components if required, would
just need to know what. the PCB looks fine with no obvious breaks

If you can help me please let me know :)

conversations.body_text: Hi Harry,  Please plug it directly into a rear USB 3.0 port on your PC and check if it works properly.

Hi there
I've given this a try and still no device detected. I've tried on multiple
PCs too still nothing ?

Hi Harry,  Sure, we will send you a replacement control board. Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and full shipping address, and we will arrange shipment as soon as possible after confirmation.
